paragraph1: Full-Stack developer who values exploring new technologies and facing big challenges. JavaScript enthusiast and its frameworks, in addition to exploring the areas of Machine Learning and Artificial Intelligence. Currently works as a Java Back-End developer.
paragraph2: Graduated from the Federal University of Grande Dourados (UFGD) at Bachelor of Information Systems course. During graduation, participated in the Institutional Scientific Initiation Program, developing the work plan “Automatic Conversion, for Binary Relations, of Association Relations Extracted Automatically“.
paragraph3: His biggest goal is to become a reference in the area of operation, learning, sharing knowledge and with great dedication. He believes that with an exemplary, dedicated team, where everyone collaborates and does their part, something extraordinary happens.
